description: Odd number of 0's in binary expansion.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember;  if n::even then -a(n/2) + 3*n + 1 else a((n-1)/2) + n + 1 fiend proc:a(0):= 0:seq(a(n),n=0..100); # _Robert Israel_, Feb 23 2016
prog: (PARI) is(n)=hammingweight(bitneg(n,#binary(n)))%2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 26 2013(Haskell)a059009 n = a059009_list !! (n-1)a059009_list = filter (odd . a023416) [1..]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 21 2014
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 2000
